channel.title: Hackthebox on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Hackthebox on Home

item.title: Stepping into the world of OT Penetration Testing with Alchemy
High-Level Red Team Training: Cybernetics & APTLabs Review
item.description: A few months ago, I published a blog post where I reviewed the first three HackTheBox Pro Labs that I completed in summer 2023: Offshore, RastaLabs and Zephyr. Over the winter months of this year, I took on the challenge to complete the two remaining advanced labs: Cybernetics and APTLabs. They are both rated as highly challenging, realistic and modern training environments for red team operators and penetration testers.

item.title: Intermediary-Level Red Team Training: Offshore, RastaLabs & Zephyr Review
item.description: During the summer months of July and August of 2023 I had the opportunity to complete three of the six buyable HackTheBox Pro Lab certifications: Offshore, a Penetration Tester Level 3 lab, as well as RastaLabs and Zephyr, both of which are Red Team Operator Level 1 certifications respectively.
